name: IEEE DTU Troika Android App
body:
# TROIKA 2013 Android App 

## 2014
* Android app for Troika 2014.
* Source present on branch "2014"
* Releasing an app for a fest has become a trend now.
* In order to stand out from other mundance apps, we have in-app registration,
  and a better event viewer based on sliding tabs

## 2013 
* Android app for Troika 2013.
* Source present on branch "2013"
* First time TROIKA released their own app.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
